channel.title: Pictures
channel.description: how do i take a picture and put it up here? i dont have a digital camera and i dont know how everyone else does it.

item.title: Pictures
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“1234ideclareathumbwar, post:2, topic:157485”]Beside your F12/Backspace button, there is a button called ‘Print Screen Sys Rq’.Press it once and go into Paint and hit Ctrl+V.

Upload it on photobucket.You’re done.[/quote]

You know there is more programs other then paint then to take photos for example, If you want something more sharp, Add writing easy, better to take photos download Irfan View.

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Beside your F12/Backspace button, there is a button called ‘Print Screen Sys Rq’.Press it once and go into Paint and hit Ctrl+V.

Upload it on photobucket.You’re done.
